duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure all work on the Manufacturing floors is completed by following written/visual WI's and Workmanship standards.
Set and follow priorities, completing tasks promptly while achieving high-quality standards.
Work side by side with Post Processors when time allows, and champion safety initiatives and processing improvements.
Support engineering, development, and quality departments to ensure customer standards and company goals are met.
Champion 6s, Lean Manufacturing, and Continuous Improvement projects with the team, and drive a strong team culture.
Recognize non-conforming products and ensure necessary steps are initiated/adhered to and communicated.
Help Supervisors ensure team's training plans are up to date and current, conducting in-person training when processes change or new processes are developed.
Give feedback to Department Manager/Supervisor about team and tech performance.
Work with various types of machinery and auxiliary equipment to attain a finished product, including Blast Cabinets, Micro Grinders, Industrial Sander, Hand tools, and Ultra Sonic Cleaning Line.

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma or GED. Technical information access requires the candidate to be a US person.
